display_html:
data StoreError
  • = CryptoError CryptoError
  • | RSAError Error
  • | DecodingError ASN1Error
  • | ParseFailure String
  • | DecryptionFailed
  • | BadContentMAC
  • | BadChecksum
  • | DigestMismatch
  • | SignatureNotVerified
  • | InvalidInput String
  • | InvalidPassword String
  • | InvalidParameter String
  • | UnexpectedPublicKeyType
  • | UnexpectedPrivateKeyType
  • | RecipientTypeMismatch
  • | RecipientKeyNotFound
  • | NoRecipientInfoFound
  • | NoRecipientInfoMatched
  • | UnsupportedOriginatorFormat
  • | UnsupportedEllipticCurve
  • | NamedCurveRequired
name: StoreError CryptoError RSAError DecodingError ParseFailure DecryptionFailed BadContentMAC BadChecksum DigestMismatch SignatureNotVerified InvalidInput InvalidPassword InvalidParameter UnexpectedPublicKeyType UnexpectedPrivateKeyType RecipientTypeMismatch RecipientKeyNotFound NoRecipientInfoFound NoRecipientInfoMatched UnsupportedOriginatorFormat UnsupportedEllipticCurve NamedCurveRequired
